Wholesale

Good food grown right

We offer year-round delivery in Western Massachusetts and the Boston area, as well as on-farm pickup. We also work with local distributors to reach New York City and beyond. Please visit our wholesale page for more information, or to set up an account.

ELS Farm currently sells wholesale to the following businesses:

Whole Foods Market: Hadley Whole Foods Market South End: Boston Big Y: Amherst, Greenfield, Northampton
